articles.title: Hubble is still stuck in safe mode, so NASA turned on an instrument that has been idle for 11 years - Daily Mail

articles.title: Scientists present the dark side of Pluto in new images - Daily Mail
articles.description: Capturing the shot of Pluto involved leveraging light that was reflected off the largest of Pluto's five moons, Charon, according to a study published by the American Astronomical Society.

articles.description: Known as the US space agency's Double Asteroid Redirection Test (DART) mission, it will involve sending the DART spacecraft out to the Didymos binary asteroid system.

articles.title: Meet 'Cold Bone': New dinosaur species found in Greenland - Daily Mail
articles.description: The new dinosaur honours the local Inuit language - its scientific name Issi saaneq means 'Cold Bone'. Its remains were found in Jameson Land, east Greenland.
articles.content:
